snippet: Ukraine accused Russia of downing a military transport plane, and each side accused the other of attacking the town of Snizhne.
abstract: Ukraine and Russia trade increasingly bitter accusations of cross-border hostilities, deepening shadowy war of real attacks or orchestrated sabotage that increasingly threatens to draw two countries into direct conflict.

byline.original: By DAVID M. HERSZENHORN and SABRINA TAVERNISE
byline.contributor: David M. Herszenhorn reported from Kiev, and Sabrina Tavernise from Luhansk, Ukraine. Michael R. Gordon contributed reporting from Vienna, and Peter Baker from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Ukraine accused Russia of downing a military transport plane, and each side accused the other of attacking the town of Snizhne.

headline.main: Border Tensions Rise Between Ukraine and Russia
headline.print_headline: Border Tensions Rise Between Ukraine and Russia
